# Class Activity

## Class Activity

-   What is a non-textbook (or math/stats/cs) book that you want to read, but don't have time to?

-   Take a five minutes to think of the book.

-   On a piece of paper, write the name of the book and why you want to read it. You will turn this in!

-   Talk to your neighbor and share the book you want to read.

# Community Projects

## Community Project

-   Using publicly available data, you will form in groups to answer the questions asked by the community partner.

-   All projects will require GIS work

-   Some projects are easier than others

-   All analysis must be conducted in R

-   Groups will have free-range of the analysis, but it must be related to the topic.

-   These are student-lead independent projects under the guidance of the professor.

-   The groups will be created by the professor.

-   The final product will be a scientific report.

## Community Member

[Community Action Ventura County](https://ca-vc.org/)

## Community Projects

-   Identify locations to distribute diapers, and other infant products, to Ventura Couny

-   Understand how climate change affects food insecurity in Ventura County

-   Understanding the geographic distribution of vaccine hesitancy of Ventura County

## Diaper Distribution

-   Locations where low income families reside.

-   Identify challenges to diaper acquirement

-   Closest WIC or other low/no-cost infant locations

-   Travel Time and bus routes

-   Required knowledge

    -   GIS

    -   Network Analysis

-   Challenges to Analysis:

    -   Network Analysis

## Climate Change

-   What are climate change factors affecting food insecurity?

    -   Flooding

    -   Disease

        -   Mosquito-borne diseases

    -   Temperature

-   Required knowledge

    -   GIS

-   Challenges to Analysis

    -   Disciplinary knowledge

## Vaccine Hesitancy

-   Using school data and census data, you will create a model to identify which factors affect vaccine uptake.

-   Required Knowledge

```         
-   GIS

-   Spatial Regression
```

-   Challenges to Analysis

    -   Must incorporate a Monte Carlo Approach
